transcript.text: another shallotte has come and gone if
ever there was a day in which our Father
would bring the needed revival that this
nation the United States of America
needs it would be upon this day is this
not a perfect day after all this was the
day two thousand years ago in which he
rained down the Holy Spirit upon the
gathered 120 in the upper room and yet
as with every year that passes we've
come to another shadow out and by and
large the millions of American churches
that met today if they even did give lip
service that this was indeed chavalo
toward Kennecott Sunday continued their
spiritual slumber and so as another
shadow wolf passes we have another year
that passes us deeper into the cesspool
of sin that this nation continues to
wallowing we need and we should have
churches across America mourning over
their sin seeking Yahweh fasting and
returning to the Torah and the prophets
and his standard of righteousness but
instead we have a church that is asleep
and a nation determined to continue its
headlong plunge into hedonism and all
manner of degenerate sin and so as
another shavuot passes we get one more
year deeper into that sin one year
closer toward that judgment that
inevitable judgment which yah must bring
upon this nation and when he brings this
fury of judgment upon this nation for
all our many iniquities it will be quick
and violent and it will be devastating
this nation has had many opportunities
to turn back to Yahweh the church has
had many opportunities to humble itself
and return to the ways of Torah but
those who try to promote obedience to
the Torah are laughed at and cast aside
and marginalized even within the
Messianic movement that proclaims a
return to the Hebrew roots of the
Christian faith many of the leadership
violate Torah by buying and selling on
Sabbath and other such nonsense we
should not be shocked we should not be
dismayed it should not be taken off
guard when the violence omnipotent fist
of Yahweh crashes down upon this nation
for truly our iniquities have reached
unto heaven
